entities.name: U.S. GOVERNMENT BODIES
entities.description: U.S. government bodies responsible for trade protection and national security policies, including tariffs, import or export regulations, trade and economic sanctions, and other trade barriers and restrictions.

entities.name: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE'S U.S. ENTITY LIST
entities.description: A list maintained by the U.S. Department of Commerce that includes entities subject to trade restrictions.

entities.name: RUSSIA
entities.description: A country that has been subject to economic sanctions and export control measures in response to its invasion of Ukraine.

entities.name: UNITED STATES
entities.description: A country that has imposed economic sanctions and export control measures on Russia in response to its invasion of Ukraine.

entities.name: UKRAINE
entities.description: A country that has been invaded by Russia, leading to economic sanctions and export control measures by the United States and its allies.

entities.name: CHINESE GOVERNMENT
entities.description: The government of China, which has imposed restrictions on gaming activities and access to games.

entities.name: AI TECHNOLOGIES
entities.description: Technologies related to artificial intelligence, which may be subject to additional regulatory restrictions.

relationships.relationship_description: The United States has imposed economic sanctions and export control measures on Russia in response to its invasion of Ukraine.
The United States has imposed economic sanctions and export control measures to support Ukraine in response to Russia's invasion.

relationships.target_entity: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE'S U.S. ENTITY LIST
relationships.relationship_description: The U.S. Department of Commerce's U.S. Entity List is maintained as part of the trade protection and national security policies enforced by U.S. government bodies.
Russia invaded Ukraine, leading to economic sanctions and export control measures by the United States and its allies.
